summary: This mod fixes several audio issues in Moonpath to Elsweyr.  It fixes issues including character volume and clarity.
descriptionHtml:
MOONPATH TO ELSWEYR (AUDIO PATCH) v1.0
By TheInkBunny


DESCRIPTION
This patch is designed to improve the audio quality within the Moonpath to Elsweyr campaign, and bring sound levels more in line with the vanilla game. All 186 lines of dialogue have been updated and enhanced for better clarity. To keep the mod in the spirit of the authors vision, no lines have been rerecored, but instead edited from their original source.

(Verified and tested with the 9.5 beta version of "Moonpath to Elsweyr". It's recommended this and/or later versions should be the one you use.)

REQUIREMENTS
Moonpath to Elsweyr (Either the BSA or Unpacked versions will work.)

INSTALLATION
For best results install with the mod manager of your choice. Overwrite any file that shows a conflict.

For manual install, extract the archive and place the "sound" folder into Skyrim's Data folder. Overwrite and merge as necessary.

RECOMMENDED MODS:
Moonpath to Elsweyr (Typo Patch) by Joesph Russell http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51556/?

A SPECIAL THANKS TO MUPPETPUPPET AND THE DESIGN TEAM FOR THEIR AMAZING CAMPAIGN
author: TheInkBunny
